price: 70. »solo me ha sido revelado que no soy más que un amonestador que os expone con claridad (los mandatos de Al-lah)».
arabic: إِن يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّ إِلَّآ أَنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: in yūḥā ilayya illā annamā anā nadhīrun mubīnun
